channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: From ‘Superman’ To ‘Fantastic Four,’ It’s The Worst-Performing Superhero Year Since 2011
item.description: Despite a number of good superhero movies, this is the worst year at the box office for the genre in 14 years.

item.title: Performance Marketing’s Limitations: What You Need To Know

item.title: Prior Authorization: Access Barrier Or Fraud Deterrent?
item.description: Prior authorization has caused significant frustration for patients and physicians. A new study finds that it is also highly effective in combating fr...

item.title: Why You Can’t See Netflix’s ‘KPop Demon Hunters’ In Theaters Anymore
item.description: KPop Demon Hunters has already been taken out of theaters despite winning the box office this past weekend. Why would Netflix do that?

item.title: Is Destiny 2’s 450 Power Grind The Worst Ever, Or Just In 11 Years?
item.description: Destiny 2 may have introduced the worst grind in the history of the series with the push to 450, and that is saying something.
